name: Commonwealth ex rel. Specter v. Douglass, Appellant
name_abbreviation: Commonwealth ex rel. Specter v. Douglass

judges: Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
parties: Commonwealth ex rel. Specter v. Douglass, Appellant.
attorneys: Edward B. Bergman, with him Solo, Abrams, Bergman, Trommer & Padova, for appellant.

casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth ex rel. Specter v. Douglass, Appellant.
Argued September 29, 1966.
Before Bell, C. J.,
Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
November 15, 1966:
reargument refused December 5, 1966.
Edward B. Bergman, with him Solo, Abrams, Bergman, Trommer & Padova, for appellant.
Leslie J. Carson, Jr., Assistant District Attorney, with him Alan J. Davis, Assistant District Attorney, Richard A. Sprague, First Assistant District Attorney, and Arlen Specter, District Attorney, for appellee.
